website_summaries.verdict: If you have a bit extra in your projector budget and can appreciate its excellent image, the BenQ HT2050 is the best choice at this price level.
pros: The BenQ HT2050 has excellent overall image quality with superb black levels and contrast for the money
A shorter-throw lens helps it project a larger image in smaller spaces
It's relatively affordable for this level of quality
cons: Competing projectors can get brighter and offer more-accurate color out of the box

customer_reviews.title: I know this is a problem with projectors in general but it seems like if this is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Reviews of quality of picture and ease of use are accurate and completely in line with its price. HOWEVER, 6 months into using it, the bulb gave out with fewer than 100 hrs of use. The warranty only covers 3 months. The bulb is $250. I know this is a problem with projectors in general but it seems like if this is a problem, the warranty should be longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, unless you see rainbows
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an upgrade to an old 720 projector. This is much brighter and 1080. First order of business: Zootopia. Looked amazing. But, watching things with more noticeable contrast, I started to see the DLP rainbows. Only a small percentage of the population notices them, apparently. I'm one of them. Lucky me. I returned this and went for an LCD projector. It's still a great projector, it's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: TimTheEnchanter

customer_reviews.title: Pass the Popcorn! Just like the Movies
customer_reviews.text: This projector is an awesome buy! I just moved into a new house with a purposeful built home theater room. No windows, etc. This projector and 125" screen together with a kickin' sound system is a mind blowing experience. I had all the audio, so had to buy this projector and the screen. Together, they ran less than 750.00. Now I have this awesome movie experience (and sports!) for a fraction of what a big screen that size would cost. I know that it doesn't do 4K yet, but I'm fine with that. When those projectors drop in price, I might consider the upgrade, but for now, this is an awesome projector for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Alfano

customer_reviews.title: Very nice upgrade from 1070.
customer_reviews.text: My first projector was the awesome benq 1070 which served me faithfully for four years of constant use (averaging 14 hours a day) even with dust and dander and other things floating through the air before it finally gave up. I was totally satisfied with that performance given the low cost and excellent picture. I was tempted to just get another 1070 even though it's old news now. But I'm glad I chose this newer model. It's a little larger, but it seems to me the size is due to upgrades in hardware and cooling, which is good. This projector was the same price as the old 1070 and the picture is even brighter with more accurate colors. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Largest purchase ever made on Amazon. Did a lot of research, from the multiple projector enthusiasts websites, this is the best projector under $1000 in 2017. Reason for 4 stars: the fan can get loud occasionally. needs a break after an hour or two. 4 stars because it changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a discount price
customer_reviews.text: Worth every dollar. This thing out did my 70inch 4k Sony TV. I bought it for the movie experience. 1080p is actually 1080p no weird caveots. Only knock I have for this thing is I wish I had the ability to shift the image side to side not just vertical. If you're looking for a simple setup that will blow you away for a mere 1500 all inclusive setup this is it. I can't imagine not having a projector setup anymore. I was able to get 148inches out of a 15ft throw at full 1080P. Benq all day over the Epson 2040 or Optoma hd27.
customer_reviews.author: sarok omer shareef

customer_reviews.title: Jaw-dropping quality of image
customer_reviews.text: Jaw-dropping image quality. I had previously an almost-HD Infocus DLP projector that was really good for its time. Back in 2002. This one is so much brighter, contrasty, great black levels, punchy color, clear detail in bright whites. I use it in Cinema mode because I only watch movies on this and it's just like I'm at the movie theater, with my 120" Da-Lite screen. The 3D, again, is jaw-dropping. Now I want to see every Blu-Ray out there, just to gawk at the quality of image. Specially the 3D movies!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morey

customer_reviews.title: Currently I am projecting on a slightly off white wall and the picture is fantastic, but I assume a dedicated screen might be ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector has taken my media viewing experience up several notches! While this is the first projector I have personally owned it is everything I was expecting after reading all of the reviews. I have not experimented with watching it in a room containing much ambient light as the experience in a completely dark room is so similar to an actual theater. Currently I am projecting on a slightly off white wall and the picture is fantastic, but I assume a dedicated screen might be even better. The price is fairly average and seems like a worthwhile purchase with the experience I have enjoyed so far. If you as hesitant, don't be. This projector will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Tim L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is excellent! Blown away by how effective this projector is
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a short throw projector! Falsely advertised as being so. Check out BenQ's HT2150ST If you do not have a very large room to provide sufficient throw distance. Quality is excellent! Blown away by how effective this projector is. Picture quality, brightness, & color are exceptional for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great projector even for smaller rooms
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for a home theater. Mounted this in our small 11 x 12 theater room. I was worried about throw distance and screen size but it perfectly displays a 110" screen in the small room. Quality of the picture is excellent. I can't speak on how it looks in a lit room because the room it is in has no windows so when the door is shut it is DARK which only makes the picture look that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burke

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few months now and it has been great. It is very quiet and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I have had this projector for a few months now and it has been great. It is very quiet and easy to setup, the colors are wonderful and it has nice inky blacks. I calibrated it with a Spyder 4 Elite and it looked almost the exact same from when it was straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: New to projection tv and extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: New too projection tv so didn't know what to expect. Very easy to ceiling mount and set up was a breeze. Picture quality is phenomenal and compares easily with other 1080p tv's in the house. Could not be happier with the price and product received.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive picture quality out of the box. Looks great on my Silver Ticket 110" screen! Per a review I read, I turned down the contrast a bit and turned off Brilliant Color Mode, picture looks even better now! The BenQ HT2050 is quiet, has a nice backlit remote, user-friendly menus, and I haven't noticed any rainbow effect. I thought about getting the HT3050 but didn't need the additional features, couldn't justify spending $200 more for it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: ... owning this and I can say it is another amazing Benq projecter
customer_reviews.text: Few months of owning this and I can say it is another amazing Benq projecter. This is my 2nd for my living room on a 120in screen. My first is a BenqW1070 in my basement that is still in use on a 168 in screen. Would recommend these to anyone seriously debating these gimmicky new TVs every few years with a new gimmick to sell them
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Spook

customer_reviews.title: 4 Years Running Strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Projector for my movie room back in 2016 and 4 years later, everything works perfectly and the picture quality is superb and crystal clear (for 1080p). There are probably better projectors now, including 4K projectors, but I have to say I'm pretty happy with this projector and this brand. When this one craps out (hopefully not anytime soon), I will definitely get another BenQ projector!
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Not the Dimmest Bulb in Town
customer_reviews.text: This projector represents an unusually good "sweet spot" in price and performance. Not the brightest bulb in town, nor the dimmest. Very good user interface and perhaps one of the best thought-out remotes we've used anywhere. The built-in audio performance is far better than was expected and makes this a much simpler device to use when setting it up in a variety of settings. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HB Gear Reviews

customer_reviews.title: This projector is significantly better! I'm impressed by how rich the colors are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second projector. Our first projector was an Epson and I bought it because I was afraid of the color rainbows. This projector is significantly better! I'm impressed by how rich the colors are and it's like watching tv for the first time. I don't see any color rainbows and this projector is awesome for the money. If you buy this, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and unbelievable picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just had my first home theatre built and this was the projector I went with. I don't know if I could be happier. The image quality is outstanding! It was incredibly easy to install. The cost/value ration is incredible! Once 4k projectors become more affordable I will stick with the BenQ brand!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Marek

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars, but have to take one away because when I turn it on, it does not pick up the signal from the cable box. I have to disconnect the HDMI at the back of the box, wait a few seconds, the reconnect before the projector recognizes the signal. Other than that, it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: LBHunter

customer_reviews.title: BenQ HT2050
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I also own a BenQ W1070 and this is a good step up. The picture seems to be brighter and more life like. It is also is just as easy to set up. I mounted it to the same bracket & in the same spot as the W1070 and it was perfect. Congrats to BenQ for another great product. P.S. the only reason I upgraded is because I gave my last projector to my parents because the enjoyed watching the big screen at my house so much they wanted their own setup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mosqueda

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable bad quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Lamp exploded in just 2 years and one of fan is also not working. Design is so poor that glass particles block lamp blower fan which is hours job to clean. After cleaning and replacing lamp now DLP fan is giving errors resulting in shut down. Was good till it worked but very bad reliability and quality of parts used inside. Run away from Benq!!
customer_reviews.author: Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Projector.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, and you can't beat the price. My wife yelled at me for spending this much on a "novelty" she took less than a week to start using it daily. The picture and brightness are awesome on the 108" screen even with light pushing through the curtains. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: James Antikythera

customer_reviews.title: Really very easy. Should have done this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I deliberated on several models before purchasing this. Set up is very forgiving. That being said, be sure the projector is level and I would use projectorcentral.com for setup advice. Really very easy. Should have done this years ago! I have this paired with a elite screen acoustic transparent 100” screen with my LCR speakers behind it. Killer is the word. Awesome projector. I have a very discerning eye and there is NO rainbow effect. Just get it. If by some crazy chance you don’t like it, return it. You won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Rowe

customer_reviews.title: A dream come true
customer_reviews.text: this thing is incredible! im living in a studio apartment right now and still have room to set this up in my apartment. I am using the elite screens yard master 2, which together these two make a phenomenal picture! the projector gets a tad hot and my cat likes to stand on top of it and jump off of it like a spring board, so I built a little cover for it out of wood for when were not using the projector, but when we are we take it off so the projector can vent properly. overall I am so happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Smart

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: After a long search for a projector I went with this benq happy wit my product would be an understatement. It is amazing 2 styles of 3d 1080p quality. Now that it is football season I watch season opener I wouldn't have it another way! In my photo of the of the picture there is an xbox one controller for size. This is also on a textured wall when the wall is finished and painter I will add another picture.
customer_reviews.author: akstarchild

customer_reviews.title: Setup was quick and easy, I was able to use the same ceiling ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a w1070 that lasted for several years and malfunctioned due to my own carelessness. Setup was quick and easy, I was able to use the same ceiling mount from the previous unit also. This unit is much quieter than the other model, almost silent and is significantly brighter in both daytime and especially darkened room settings.This projector is easily worth 2-3x what it retails for, you'll feel like you got a high-end unit at the entry-level unit price.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome home theater projector.
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this. As of the date of this review 10/11/2017, we have been using this projector since July 2016. This is an extremely high quality projector that I would recommend to anyone looking for a great home theater projector with a decent price. We use this projector on a 110 inch screen and it serves as our only television in the home. Colors are rich, crisp, and there is no video lag of any sort. Works great with Apple TV, Blu-Ray movies, Cable TV, etc.
customer_reviews.author: amerikenny

customer_reviews.title: 8 Months In - Still Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the BenQ HT2050 for 8 months now. This was an impulse purchase for an anniversary party I was throwing for my in-laws and I have to say, it's found a nice place in my home now given the gorgeous, bright, and crisp images it casts. It's portable using the original packaging (the box doubles as a cheap yet robust carrying case) - been using it for presentations and impressed with how it handles competing ambient light. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AB in SF

customer_reviews.title: I love it. No projector sound at all
customer_reviews.text: I love it. No projector sound at all. The sound system of the projector is pretty good. Awesome picture quality even while projecting on the wall. Looks like my TVs are not going to be used as often.
customer_reviews.author: Bijay Bokhim

customer_reviews.title: ... a more expensive BenQ that ate bulbs for the fun of it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as replacement for a more expensive BenQ that ate bulbs for the fun of it. Has been working real well, great picture and reliable service.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Fleming

customer_reviews.title: The projector has been a fantastic addition to our home
customer_reviews.text: The projector has been a fantastic addition to our home. I do get a bit nervous that the color quality is turning yellow-ish. Otherwise, the picture stays high quality at huge projection.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M Davis

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful projector very bright. Originally thought the built in speakers were more of a gimmick but pleasantly surprised to find they were great. Cons i wish they would drop vga and component input and put a dtv tuner built in.
customer_reviews.author: Techyy555

customer_reviews.title: Overall I've been extremely happy with this projector
customer_reviews.text: Overall I've been extremely happy with this projector. However, the lamp burnt out last night after owning it for just over a year.... (bought it in September 2016) to replace the bulb with oem parts it's $250!? I use this projector often but not that much! At the highest brightness is supposed to last 3000 hrs. That's 125 days on 24/7!!!
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: We love our new projector and it's high-end options and functionalities
customer_reviews.text: We love our new projector and it's high-end options and functionalities. The HD picture is much better than other projectors that I've watched that are literally 3x the price of the BenQ! Additionally, the unit is extremely quiet... you can't even hear that the blower/cooler is on. I highly recommend this brand and model.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this Projector
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this Projector. It has made my 4k TV That cost over double just sit and never be turned on. And thats with a cheap screen. Cant wait to see how amazing this projector is with a proper screen. Everyone that has been over and seen it loves the picture it puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb H

customer_reviews.title: It is horrible. I've had my projector for about 1
customer_reviews.text: The problem with BenQ is not the projector itself. The problem is their support. It is horrible. I've had my projector for about 1.5 years. My lamp blew up after 500 hours. I've been on hold now trying to cancel my over priced replacement lamp order for 2 hours. BenQ wants $250 for a replacement lamp. You can get the 5J.JEE05.001 Osram bulb for $71 elsewhere online. That is the exact lamp you will get from BenQ for $250. I've been an IT manager for almost 20 years and have replaced all kinds of lamps for projectors. This is by far with worse experience I have ever had changing a lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Jesionowski

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I already have two BenQ projectors--1070 and ST and both work fine but I decided upgrade for HT 2050. Supposedly all of them same but price difference tell me there is something behind the curtain and, yes, HT 2050 has better colors and, in addition, if you wait for sale price you save money. Sure, you should also invest in some nice sound system and then life is good. I use regular white wall with picture size about 9 by 14 foot.
customer_reviews.author: Alexferdman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Received mine last night and I'm blown away by the brightness, deep color, clarity and ease of use. There is not much to say other than if you're wanting an affordable and incredible projector that is not only gorgeous, but bright and bursting with color and deep black levels, this so the one. Buy it, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ben Vokes

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and long lasting.  No major issues in 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Delivers on advertised capabilities. Could be a little more crisp/have a little more adjustability in focus. The remote is not as great a feature but very necessary if ceiling mounted. Controls from the remote have latency, and requires one to point the remote directly at the unit. Menus are fairly intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great projector. I have it on a 100 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. I have it on a 100 inch screen and the picture quality is amazing. The speakers on it are pretty good too, so I can put off getting a sound system for a little bit. The fan is not loud enough to even hear over the speakers and there's very little light coming out of the top of the projector. I have it ceiling mounted right above where we sit and you can't notice any sound or light from it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming projector!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this projector now for a few months and we love it. We thought we would have to deal with rainbowing with games and movies but that's not been the case. The image quality is great and response times for gaming superb. We have roughly 1000 hours on it so far and its still going strong! Can't say much about the audio since we have it going through a receiver but the image is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kerriann N. S. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and Affordable Projector
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a very affordable, ultra short throw projector where the colors pop off the screen, this model is for you. We are utilizing this projector for public film screenings in our local arts center and could not have found a better product to fit our needs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John McGee

customer_reviews.title: Once you nail the settings, the 3d is outstanding ...
customer_reviews.text: Once you nail the settings, the 3d is outstanding. I bought this specifically for 3d as I already have a lg signature 65 oled for casual movie viewing. This projector produces a gorgeous picture with a relatively short throw distance. If it wasn't for having to replace dlp bulbs I would switch to a projector full time and start looking for a high rated 4k
customer_reviews.author: Ash Talbot

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is terrific and we are very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our $5000 projector with this one. The picture quality is terrific and we are very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid P.

customer_reviews.title: Best proyector I have ever seen/used
customer_reviews.text: Best proyector I have ever seen/used Specially for the money, it proyecta a 120’ in only about 15’ of distance, the only thing I would change is the volume, when is at 1 it is still a bit loud specially when we can hear it on other areas of the house but on the other hand it’s loud enought to watch a movie that you almost don’t need a sound system
customer_reviews.author: Tony Martin

customer_reviews.title: But this did not have any of that also I am glad that I choose a DLP instead of 3LCD
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant with buying a DLP due to the rainbow effect. But this did not have any of that also I am glad that I choose a DLP instead of 3LCD.. I was able to notice the "screen" effect at one of my friends house.
customer_reviews.author: Nadar

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. Had it for several years now. Have done a bulb replacement and still going strong (we use this almost daily). Good picture quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: swood02

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is very good. This is my first projector so I cannot compare with any others, but this has definitely exceeded my expectation. Loving it and enjoying movies 😊 Even in day time (my basement gets some light) but the picture quality and brightens is really good.
customer_reviews.author: srinivas

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, reliable customer service from benq.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, vibrant colors. Had issue with white pixels, but benq provided excellent service. Fixed it in 1 week no questions asked. No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: john wollenzien

customer_reviews.title: ... projector in this price range and I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I purchased a projector in this price range and I am very pleased with this purchase. Great projector with great features. Beautiful picture, better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Crowder

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to use outside on nice nights. We used it straight on a tan ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use outside on nice nights. We used it straight on a tan stucco wall, no screen. The projector lets you select the color of wall you're projecting onto, and I have to say the picture was amazing. If I had to guess we had the picture at about 12ft diagonal and it was sharp and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Leiss

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video projector.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and set it up in my basement. I ended up projecting it about 10-11 feet away. The video quality is really good and am able to project about 100 inch wide. The sound quality is decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: carol lewis

customer_reviews.title: I was AMAZED!!
customer_reviews.text: Great projector I love it. It's been one the best projector I have invested my money into it. The picture quality is awesome and the sound actually is great. I highly recommend and it really doesn't break your pocket, you get your money worth.
customer_reviews.author: WJA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture Quality For Gaming and Movies! Advice Use Smart Eco.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to see such an amazing picture since I previously owned a mini lg projector that was good in a dark room but barely showed any image on low light. This monster despite its somewhat large size displayed a great picture even when I had the lights on. The sound coming from the projector is great for watching simple vids. Movies and games, the colors and quality were great. My advice though is to use smart-eco mode since you don't lose significant quality or brightness but you do gain an extra 3000 hours or more (based on benq mentions).
customer_reviews.author: A. FARDOUS

customer_reviews.title: This is super nice. We use it indoor/outdoor
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice . We use it indoor/outdoor . It does get very hot but so far it's working very well . Massively impressed
customer_reviews.author: o. al najjar

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: If you are a gamer like me, you'll love this projector. Picture quality, reliability, responsiveness while playing in game, and ease in setup are just a few of the reasons to consider this projector for your entertainment needs. Also, a big kudos to the merchant for a speedy delivery and flawless packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M. Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely love this device. The clarity is amazing. Even when the lights are on, you can see things so clearly. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was great product but was not for my room.
customer_reviews.text: had to return because room size was too big for the projector, i did not measure before purchase , it will not focus more than 12 ft away from the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jagruti Parikh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. For the price, the clarity is outstanding. A sound bar addition is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful movie
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Still affected by some ambient light at times. Gamma keeps resetting even tho we fine tuned it. Overall, we enjoy it in our bedroom!. Running a 140" screen. Speaker is powerful , rarely do we use our Soundbar with it. Very adjustable and sweet images.
customer_reviews.author: GorillaToyz

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Projector! Replaced a dated Panasonic model with a Benq and the difference is amazing! Only negative is there isn't any side adjustment knob/feature. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: I and my family were amazed at the picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from a VERY inexpensive projector o picked up last year. I and my family were amazed at the picture quality, sound output and quiet if the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: What a nice projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome. Very bright. I bought it on recommendations on forums and various websites. It was my first projector and I am blown away. I paired this with a Silver Ticket 100" screen. It operates quietly and is extremely clear.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D

customer_reviews.title: Super bright projector
customer_reviews.text: Super bright projector. This is my 3rd projector. I bought it to replace my 5 year old Optoma and man was i blown away by how much brighter and vibrant it is. So far, i'm getting the most out of this projector.
customer_reviews.author: A_Long_Time_Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Sleek, white, clear-what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I love it. I don't know how I did without it for so long. If it weren't hanging from the ceiling I'd give it a hug. :)
customer_reviews.author: Erindan

customer_reviews.title: this is a great projector, I started years ago with a DLP ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great projector, I started years ago with a DLP and went to LED and now glad to be back to DLP. Just a great picture for the price. This was like half the price I paid for my other 2 projectors
customer_reviews.author: mrpergo

customer_reviews.title: This has worked great for my outdoor pool area
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for my outdoor pool area! Great picture from 12-15 feet away! Need to wait until after sunset. Speakers are pretty good, would be great if you could hook them up to a larger speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Projector
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from a 13 year old Mitsubishi projector to the BenQ HT2050. It is a night and day difference and I can’t believe we waited this long to upgrade. The picture is absolutely amazing. We use it on the economy lamp setting and have had no problems with the rainbow effect. We have had no problems at all from this projector. We currently have about 150 hours on it and have loved every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice upgrade from my HD25e. Like the ability to have multiple video user modes.
customer_reviews.author: Noah D Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best sub $1,000 1080p 3d projector
customer_reviews.text: Awesome 1080p 3d projector and at an affordable price! Very bright, resolution is great, 3d is much better than on my lg tv and fan is very quiet. If you're looking to get your first projector or to replace an older one then take a look at this one. I got this to replace an optoma h27 and couldn't be happier. I find myself wanting to watch everything on it now. Great brightness even in power/bulb saving modes and with ambient lighting.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shepler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector. Be sure to use the Projector-Gear Projector Ceiling Mount for BENQ HT2050 if you are planning to mount this on the ceiling. DO NOT try to do it with the recommended QualGear PRB-717-WHT Universal Ceiling Mount Projector Accessory.
customer_reviews.author: S. sequeira

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: The projector works great. We love it! The picture quality is really impressive; I think it's better than my TV. Its difficult to see during the day in a well lit room, but at night it works great. The sound quality and volume is impressive too.
customer_reviews.author: AZAccountant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality only reason I would say 4 stars is that the manual focus and adjustment didn't go as far back as I thought it should I had my previous projector mounted on the ceiling so when I replaced it with this one I had to remove the mount and patch the holes repaint and then hang it a bit closer to fill the screen without it projecting outside of the screen bounds- otherwise very good picture quality and amazing color.
customer_reviews.author: Dr R

customer_reviews.title: Great picture. Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my 12 year old sharp projector finally gave out. Great picture. Easy setup . Would recommend. A+
customer_reviews.author: christopher sella

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Setup my theater room with 120" screen. Picture is amazing. I've recommended this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: First Projector - Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first projector I've bought and I'm very satisfied. People who are strictly TV users will be pleasantly surprised how easy the set up can be. If you are on the fence on getting a budget projector, take the leap. It is worth the wow factor. Warning: Do Not put this in a room where you can't control the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Strom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a month now and use it for a home theatre. Great image. Low noise. Speakers seem okay but you really need a 5.2 system if you're going with one of these. Highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector. Perfect for gaming and movies
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector. Perfect for gaming and movies, zero lag with my ps4. Need to update. Similar to other reviews, my lamp blew in 7 months and probably around 500 hours. Other than that it has been great, but it's way to soon to have to drop 250 more on a replacement lamp. If it does it again I'll just go higher end projector.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great product, has received heavy use as a main ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, has received heavy use as a main television projector. Latency not noticeable when gaming and 3d works very well. Have purchased 2 units, both still working fine. Projecting on 120" screen in light controlled room with dark walls.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 120" screen in my basement with full control of visible light at all hours. Looks amazing and I am glad I did not buy a tiny TV for the same cost. Everyone in my family is getting a projector after coming over for thanksgiving and watching the games on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M. Lebsack

customer_reviews.title: Cinema quality projector
customer_reviews.text: After researching several brands, chose this one. Very happy with picture quality. In cinema mode fan is very quiet. Projected on to Carl’s flexiwhite 144 inch screen and Dolby digital 5.1 sound. Amazing result, better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Prakash

customer_reviews.title: Very nice projector. Put in my downstairs at 125" and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice projector. Put in my downstairs at 125" and picture us great. Only downfall I could find is that it does not have a optical audio cable so has to use 1.5 mm
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and great picture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and great picture! We love it! We will upgrade to a BenQ 4k unit when the price comes down.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have BenQ HD 1080p projector, I don't have to go to thr theater anymore. Thanks BenQ
customer_reviews.author: Son

customer_reviews.title: Great HD quality, super easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great HD quality, super easy to install and set up. Works well with receiver and universal remote. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sartini

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this projector is amazing it don't get better than this I got one for my living room now I can't wait to order one for my bedroom
customer_reviews.author: MyLoveGlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing projector the quality blowed my mind, after having owned a BenQ Mx501 its a big upgrade..
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was the owner of the successful BenQ w1070 for 3 years. I decided to upgrade my projector ,so i got the new one and i coundn't be more happy. I absolutely love it, the image is much crispier than the older version, the colors pop up more without any tweaking in the original settings . Even my wife that is not into the home theater thing, noticed a difference .The fan is also quieter than my previous projector. I'm very satisfied with my purchase and recommend for anyone !!!
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: High quality image for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome projector! I purchased the wireless HDMI module and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Def worth the price for quality for a home. Very satisfied with my purchase and usage
customer_reviews.author: chad j.

customer_reviews.title: way better than a tv
customer_reviews.text: It has a great picture even without a screen. so far im in lovce with it and have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be better!!!!... amazing colors and evertyhing... I have a picky eye!.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this for a couple of months ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a couple of months now, and I don't know how I watched movies on our "little" 50" TV!
customer_reviews.author: Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Hard to choose between the different brands reading reviews. ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to choose between the different brands reading reviews. Went with Benq, after a few weeks using it I can say it gets positive feedback for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really good projector. Can not ask anything more. Video quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: G P

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you want
customer_reviews.text: Even during the day, it's powerful, clear and works exactly as I want
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Macke

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying our new projection system. In a dark room ...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying our new projection system. In a dark room, the picture is vibrant. I don't notice any motion artifact or rainbow effect.
customer_reviews.author: GMGarrison

customer_reviews.title: Expensive lamps
customer_reviews.text: Good picture but lamps don't last long and are around 250 to replace
customer_reviews.author: dapimpster

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It has meant all of our expectations. It works just as a projector should and has amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best out of the box picture you can find with a DLP prijector. Amazing 3D and overal image. Comes with a very useful backlit remote. Definitely recommend for anyone looking for an affortable high def capable projector.
customer_reviews.author: Julio toquica

product_meta.title: BenQ DLP HD Projector (HT2050) - 3D Home Theater Projector with All-Glass Cinema Grade Lens and RGBRGB Color Wheel,Silver/white
product_meta.description:
Style:HT2050

Projection System: DLP
Native Resolution: 1080p (1920 x 1080)
Brightness: 2200 ANSI Lumens
Contrast Ratio: 15000:1
Display Color: 1.07 Billion Colors
Lens: F= 2.59-2.87, f=16.88-21.88mm
Aspect Ratio: Native 16:9 (5 aspect ratio selectable)
Throw Ratio: 1.15 - 1.5 (100" @ 2.5m)
Image Size (Diagonal): 60"~180"
Zoom Ratio: 1.3:1
Lamp Type: 240W
Lamp Mode(Normal/Economic/SmartEco/LampSave/LumenCare): 3500/5000/6000 hours

Keystone Adjustment: Manual vertical ± 40 degrees
Projection Offset: 105% ± 2.5%
Resolution Support: VGA(640 x 480) to WUXGA_RB (1920 x 1200) *RB = Reduced Blanking
Horizontal Frequency: 15 - 102KHz
Vertical Scan Rate: 23 - 120Hz

Interface: 
Computer in (D-sub 15pin) x 1 
Composite video in (RCA) x 1 
Component video in x 1 
HDMI x 2 
Audio in (Mini Jack) x 1 
Audio L/R in (RCA) x 1 
Audio out (Mini Jack) x 1 
Chamber Speaker 10W x 1 
USB (Type A) x1 (5V/1.5A power supply) 
USB (Type Mini B) x1 (service) 
RS232 (DB-9pin) x 1 
DC 12V Trigger x 1 
IR receiver x 2 (Front & Top)

Dimensions (W x H x D): 14.9” x 4.8” x 10.9”
HDTV Compatibility: 480i, 480p, 576i, 567p, 720p, 1080i, 1080p
Video Compatibility: NTSC, PAL, SECAM, SDTV
3D Support and Compatibility: 
Frame Sequential: Up to 720p 
Frame Packing: Up to1080p 
Side by Side: Up to 1080i/p 
Top Bottom: Up to 1080p

Weight: 7.93lbs
Audible Noise (Normal /Economic Mode): 29 / 27 dBA
Power Supply: AC100 to 240V, 50 to 60 Hz
Power Consumption: Normal 330W, Eco 280W, Standby <0.5W

Accessories Included (Standard): 
Lens Cover
Remote Control w/ Battery
Power Cord
User Manual CD
Quick Start Guide
Warranty Card
feature_bullets: HIGH RESOLUTION: 3D 1080p projector with ANSI Brightness of 2,200 Lumens, 15,000:1 contrast, premium RGBRGB Color Wheel and ISFccc Certified Calibration for Day/Night viewing
QUIET PROJECTOR: Whisper quiet operation, with the lowest fan noise in its class allows viewers to hear the movie, not the projector.
SHORTER THROW PROJECTOR: Easy installation and setup with a diagonal screen size of 60"-180", 1.3x zoom, Vertical Lens Shift and a throw ratio of 1.15-1.5 (79"@6.6ft)
ENERGY EFFICIENT PROJECTOR: Includes SmartEco technology for energy conservation and auto standby mode to save energy and prolong lamp life; lamp lasts up to 7,000 hours
RELIABLE BRAND: BenQ is the #1 best-selling DLP projector brand worldwide with 1 year warranty for parts and labor
HDTV Compatibility: 480i, 480p, 576i, 567p, 720p, 1080i, 1080p‎, Video Compatibility: NTSC, PAL, SECAM, SDTV‎

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars398 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
